messages.textToSpeech: You can set a legacy contact on Facebook. A legacy contact is someone you choose to look after your account if it's memorialized. Facebook strongly suggest setting a legacy contact so your account can be managed once it's memorialized. You can also download your data from Facebook to prevent it from getting deleted if you choose to delete your account.
